article_title: 'Roll on Capitol Hill' event heartens Waverly woman

og.description: WAVERLY | "Just awesome" is how Waverly’s Jennifer Wolff described this year’s United Spinal Association event in Washington, D.C., called Roll on Capitol Hill.
